articles.author: Reece Rogers
articles.title: Here's How Generative AI Depicts Queer People - WIRED
articles.description: WIRED investigates how artificial intelligence tools, like OpenAI’s Sora, currently portray members of the LGBTQ community. Hint: It’s a lot of purple hair.
articles.content: Another potential strategy to diversify the output from AI models is for developers to add guardrails and modify user prompts, nudging the software toward inclusivity. OpenAI appears to have taken th… [+5843 chars]
